articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Musk sees fourth flight of SpaceX's Starship in 3-5 weeks - Reuters
articles.description: SpaceX's Starship rocket, a futuristic vehicle designed to eventually carry astronauts to the moon and beyond, will probably have its fourth flight in 3-5 weeks, the company's Chief Executive Elon Musk said in a post on social media platform X on Saturday.
